parse.title: List of Disney live-action reimaginings of animated films

text.*:

This media article uses IMDb for verification. IMDb may not be a reliable source for film and television information and is generally only cited as an external link. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. Please help by replacing IMDb with third-party reliable sources. (August 2017) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
This article needs additional or more specific categories. Please help out by adding categories to it so that it can be listed with similar articles. (August 2017)
This article relies too much on references to primary sources. Please improve this by adding secondary or tertiary sources. (September 2017) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
(Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of Disney live-action reimaginings of animated films. This list does not include remakes of live-action films, or animated movies that were produced by another studio and later reimagined into live-action films by Disney.

Contents

  • 1 Released
  • 2 Upcoming
  • 3 Other potential projects
  • 4 See also
  • 5 References

Other potential projects[edit]

Disney announced a live-action film based on One Hundred and One Dalmatians, titled Cruella, focused on the character of Cruella de Vil.[30] Also announced a sequel to the film The Jungle Book.[31]

Other projects of live-action adaptations from animation films include Lady and the Tramp,[32] The Little Mermaid,[33][34] Peter Pan,[35] Pinocchio,[36][37][38][39] and The Sword in the Stone.[40]

Two live-action projects of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs have been announced, one based on the eponymous animation film, and other on the tale Snow-White and Rose-Red.[41][42][43] Also an untitled Chronicles of Prydain film (previously Disney adapted the stories in the animated film The Black Cauldron) has been announced.[44][45]

See also[edit]

  • Oz the Great and Powerful
  • Into the Woods
  • Pete's Dragon, a live-action remake of the live-action/animation film of the same name.
  • Mary Poppins Returns, a live-action/animation sequel to a live-action/animation movie released around the same time period as many of the above.
